flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
A very cautious
POKMON, it raises
itself up using its tail to get a
better view of its
surroundings.

It stands on its
tail so it can see
a long way. If it spots an enemy, it
cries loudly to
warn its kind.

When acting as a
lookout, it warns
others of danger by screeching and
hitting the ground
with its tail.

When SENTRET sleeps, it does so while
another stands guard. The sentry wakes
the others at the first sign of danger. When this POKMON becomes separated
from its pack, it becomes incapable of
sleep due to fear.

When SENTRET sleeps, it does so while
another stands guard. The sentry wakes
the others at the first sign of danger. When this POKMON becomes separated
from its pack, it becomes incapable of
sleep due to fear.

They take turns standing guard when it
is time to sleep. The sentry awakens the
others if it senses danger. If one becomes
separated, it turns sleepless with fear.

It stands on its tail so it can see a long
way. If it spots an enemy, it cries loudly
to warn its kind.

A very cautious POKMON, it raises itself
up using its tail to get a better view of
its surroundings.

It has a very nervous nature.
It stands up high on its tail so it
can scan wide areas.

It has a very nervous nature.
It stands up high on its tail so it
can scan wide areas.

It has a very nervous nature.
It stands up high on its tail so it
can scan wide areas.

A very cautious Pokmon, it raises
itself up using its tail to get a
better view of its surroundings.

It stands on its tail so it can see
a long way. If it spots an enemy, it
cries loudly to warn its kind.

Ce Pokmon trs nerveux
prend appui sur sa queue pour
observer ses alentours.

It has a very nervous nature.
It stands up high on its tail so it
can scan wide areas.

Ce Pokmon trs nerveux
prend appui sur sa queue pour
observer ses alentours.

It has a very nervous nature.
It stands up high on its tail so it
can scan wide areas.

It has a very nervous nature.
It stands up high on its tail so it
can scan wide areas.

It has a very nervous nature.
It stands up high on its tail so it
can scan wide areas.

Sil fait le guet, il prvient les autres dun danger
en criant et en frappant le sol de sa queue.

Wenn es Wache hat, warnt es seine Artgenossen,
indem es schreit und mit dem Schwanz auf den
Boden schlgt.

Cuando hace de centinela, avisa del peligro a los
dems, chillando y dando golpes al suelo con la cola.

La vedetta avverte i suoi compagni del pericolo
gridando e battendo la coda sul terreno.

When acting as a lookout, it warns others of danger
by screeching and hitting the ground with its tail.

Il se tient dress sur sa queue pour voir les ennemis
arriver de loin.  ce moment, il avertit ses amis.

Es stellt sich auf den Schweif, um weiter zu blicken.
Erspht es einen Feind, schreit es laut auf.

Se apoya sobre su cola para ver a mucha distancia.
Si divisa a un enemigo, dar la alarma a gritos.

Ritto sulla coda, guarda lontano. Se nota un nemico
lancia forti richiami per avvertire quelli della sua specie.

It stands on its tail so it can see a long way.
If it spots an enemy, it cries loudly to warn its kind.

Lorsquun Fouinette dort, un autre monte la garde.
La sentinelle rveille les autres au moindre signe de danger.
Si un de ces Pokmon est spar de sa meute, il est incapable
de dormir, car il a peur.

Wenn Wiesor schlft, hlt immer jemand Wache. Beim ersten
Anflug von Gefahr weckt die Wache die anderen auf. Wenn
dieses Pokmon von seinen Artgenossen getrennt wird,
kann es vor Angst nicht mehr schlafen.

Sentret no duerme a menos que otro haga guardia. El que
hace de centinela lo despertar al mnimo signo de peligro.
Cuando este Pokmon se separa de su manada, es incapaz
de echarse a dormir, presa del miedo.

Sentret dorme soltanto se un suo simile rimane vigile.
La vedetta allerta gli altri al primo segnale di pericolo.
Se viene allontanato dal branco, questo Pokmon
non riesce pi a dormire dalla paura.

When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard.
The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger.
When this Pokmon becomes separated from its pack,
it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.

Si un de ces Pokmon est spar de sa meute, il est incapable
de dormir, car il a peur.

Se viene allontanato dal branco, questo Pokmon
